## Matrix.builder() method

Yields a `MatrixBuilder` which will build new matrices of the same type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
builder(): MatrixBuilder<S, Vector<S>, Matrix<S>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`MatrixBuilder<S, Vector<S>, Matrix<S>>`
